definition: the Qin (221-207 BC) and Han (206 BC-220 AD) dynasties
surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]
man
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Mr Qin is our history teacher. He has a wonderful name Qin Han.
sentences.chinese: 秦先生是我们的历史老师，他有一个好听的名字秦汉。

sentences.english: Qin and Han dynasties, Dalian jurisdiction of Liaodong county.
sentences.chinese: 秦汉时期，大连地区属辽东郡辖区。

sentences.english: The Qin and Han dynasties had different bordland governance achievements.
sentences.chinese: 秦汉王朝边地治理的功绩成效各异。

sentences.english: Therefore, the Qin and Han Jian Du of high academic value.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这些秦汉简牍具有很高的学术价值。

sentences.english: Feudal economic structure formulated in Warring States period.
sentences.chinese: 战国秦汉时期是我国封建制度的奠基时期。

sentences.english: The time from earlier Qin to Qin and Han dynasty, was the important period for the formation ofthe Han and Hun.
sentences.chinese: 先秦至秦汉时期，是汉匈民族形成的重要时期。

sentences.english: In the second section, the thesis discusses the logistic security in Qin and Han Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，着力于对秦汉军队后勤保障的问题研究。

sentences.english: The first book to analyse the history of the regime change from Qing Dynasty to Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第一本以科学手法解剖秦汉更替历史的通俗说史大书。

sentences.english: Qiang people migrated to the interior of China under the oppression of the ruling class during Qin and Han Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 秦汉时期羌族在统治阶级的压迫下不断向内地迁徙。

sentences.english: The social images of the drunkward were not that glamorous.
sentences.chinese: 秦汉时期“酒徒”的社会形象，似乎并不光彩。

sentences.english: Jin Yunbo followed the telegraph signal Qin Hanjie came to the Qi mansion.
sentences.chinese: 晋云波追随着秦汉杰的电报机信号来到了戚公馆。

sentences.english: Gu Qi, tell mother, Han Jie has died.
sentences.chinese: 顾州告诉戚母，秦汉杰已经死亡。

sentences.english: A dog let them tell the Japanese army, Qin Jie has died.
sentences.chinese: 犬养让他们告诉日本军部，秦汉杰已经死亡。

sentences.english: In Qin-Han Dynasty people had produced the first refining flowers machine.
sentences.chinese: 到秦汉时期人们已经发明了第一部提花机。

sentences.english: Finally, the paper discusses related management to female prisoners of Qin-Han dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 最后，本文探讨了秦汉对女性刑徒的相关管理。

sentences.english: Fourth, "The Pre-qin and Han Dynasty Wei Jin Southern and NorthernDynasties Poem " literature value.
sentences.chinese: 《先秦汉魏晋南北朝诗》的文学价值。

definition: Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
Qin dynasty (221-207 BC), founded by the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2], the first dynasty to rule the whole of China
the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
Wei (220-265) and Jin (265-420) dynasties
Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
Sui (581-617) and Tang dynasties (618-907)
Eastern or later Han dynasty, 25-220
Northern and Southern dynasties (420-589)
the Tang (618-907) and Song (960-1279) dynasties
the Ming (1368-1644) and Qing (1644-1911) dynasties
Xia, Shang and Zhou, the earliest named Chinese dynasties
Qin Dynasty (221-207 BC)
Zhou dynasty (1046-221 BC)
